snippet: A new incarnation of Batman will arrive when the Cartoon Network introduces “Beware the Batman” as part of its DC Nation, a group of shows based on DC Comics.
lead_paragraph: A new incarnation of Batman will arrive when the Cartoon Network introduces “Beware the Batman” as part of its DC Nation, a group of shows based on DC Comics.

headline.main: Batman Is Back, and He Bruises
headline.print_headline: Batman Is Back, And He Bruises
